U NO SEE THIS EVAR

The most basic thing a spellsword learns is how to activate a magical 'mode'. Using such a mode will align the elements that the rest of their spellsword training teaches and shield them from that element.

By reaching into your elemental self, you can draw forth some of that energy and use it to damage an opponent. This is not without cost: your ability to do this is limited by your mana pool. Scales to Haywire chance.
Through extensive training, you have learned to focus and retain some of your conflagratory self even when in another mode.
Through extensive training, you have learned to focus and retain some of your electrical self even when in another mode.
Through extensive training, you have learned to focus and retain some of your aethereal self even when in another mode.
Through extensive training, you have learned to focus and retain some of your hyperboric self even when in another mode.

As your spellsword skills hone themselves, you find yourself able to intensify your Attunement, granting you a larger benefit when Attuned. Further, you can retain some of that energy even when in another mode.
You can now throw your elemental energies about. This is an expensive and risky tactic: expending all your energy on vortices will leave you unable to perform arcane strikes.
